Text: Please: SHARE the file and do not remove it. Thanks.

For those of you used to using the older (and in my opinion MUCH better) version of this, don't download this version, you will be deeply disappointed in how user-unfriendly it is.

Forte really outdid themselves in making a perfectly useful newsreader into a piece of crap upgraded version
Though this software does work, like bogueart said, if you have the older version, stick with it because this god damn newer one is a piece of shit.
